divs: Sighting Detailssummer of 1992 i went to the keys(long key bridge)to go fishing! on card sound road we headed south...shortly after i noticed a object at the tree line on the west side of the road staying with us and VERY BRITE AND COLORFULL lites and NO sound at ALL!!! i pointed it out to the driver(3 of us) and he got scared and took off very fast we accelerated to over 125mph and the object stayed with us!then he slammed on the brakes.....stayed with us even with us! allmost like it knew when we were going to accelerate and knew when we were stopping! the driver repeted this 3 more times and it stayed with us......the last time we stopped i felt the overwhelming urge to get out of the truck and did.....my friends took off FAST!!!! i stayed and stared at the object for about ten mins or so! that thing stayed rite there as i was looking at it! it was at the top of the treeline rite there id say about 30-45 feet above me and about 20 ft over(west) again i felt the(overwhelming) urge to get even closer....just then the truck came flying back! my friends made me get back in the truck and we took off again(south) and repeated the same thing again! and it stayed with us again!!! after 3 more times of accelerateing(over 125mph each time) and stopping fast......the object was gone! this whole sighting lasted roughly 30-45 mins....the rest of the day niether of my friends would talk about it-actually the driver didnt speak to me about it for about 3-4yrs untill one day i saw a scetch of the craft at his mothers house!!! then we spoke about it that day! the other person didnt talk about it with me for about 16-17 yrs-but around 2009-2010 we spoke about it in great detail! the object reminded me of the couple in the 1950's who said they were abducted(i forgot there names but its a very famous case)-the craft looked like thier scetch! like a john dillinger 1920's style styrofoam campaign hat! the bottom edge was glowing white the top part was VERY brite and lots of brite colored squares(kinda)blinking and flashing! this thing was so close to me i couldve hit it with a baseball for sure! i can see this object like i was there again! i will answer any and all questions and i WILL take a lie detector test and WILL PASS with flying colors!!! i will agree to any or all interviews by your staff(mufon) or ANYONE else! this event really happened to us and it scares me to this day! that feeling(urge) to get out of the truck was crazy like i had no choice but to get out and approach the object-im not the greatest artist but i can draw it if needed! thank you for giving me a place to tell my story!everyone that ive told this story to has thought i was F-ING CRAZY! this is something that will never leave me and since the event i look at the sky much differently.......im looking forward to answering your questions! thank you so much.........dennis gallo jr
